dialog: To be truthful, you've failed your driving test.
How come?
There were several reasons for that.
What were they?
Essentially, you simply can't drive.
Can I take it again?
You can retake it in a couple of weeks.
Good morning. What's wrong?
Good morning, doctor. I have a splitting headache.
Very well, young man. Tell me, how did it start?
Yesterday, I had a runny nose. Now my nose is congested, I have a sore throat and I fear I have a temperature. I feel awful.
Don't worry, young man. Let me give you an examination. First, let me take a look at your throat. Open your mouth and say 'ah'.
Ah.
Your throat is inflamed and your tongue is heavily coated. You have all the symptoms of the flu.
What should I do then?
All you need is rest and to drink more water. I'll write you a prescription.
Thank you very much.
My dear, what's on the menu for dinner?
Red cooked carp and rape with fresh mushrooms.
What about soup?
